column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Being a server isn't easy and he's the end of the chain. But the overall service including the kitchen seemed very disorganized
column2: which echoes some of the other reviews. It was like being on the set of Hells Kitchen without the profanity. The bartenders saved it from getting 1 star. Everyone gets a second chance
column3: but only after they figure out their service.
